DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical study estimate radiation dosimetry single dose LMI1195 healthy subject heart failure patient undergo positron emission tomography ( PET )
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Trial Determine Dosimetry , Biodistribution Safety LMI 1195-101 Healthy Subjects Patients With Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Cohort 1 Inclusion : Healthy , age 1840 Cohort 1 Exclusion : Significant chronic medical illness Pregnant females Smoking within one month enrollment Use prescription drug within 4 week prior dose Cohort 2 Inclusion : 3070 year old subject diagnosis NYHA Class IIIII heart failure Ejection fraction less equal 35 % Rest SPECT image within 90 day prior enrollment Cohort 2 Exclusion : Significant chronic medical illness Pregnant females Known history arrhythmogenic disorder rhythm disorder
DOC.keyword: Heart Failure , PET Imaging , Implantable Cardioverter-Defibrillator , Dosimetry
